name: Ice Ace
description:
- Controls -

Aim with mouse, left click to hit the ice block

- Summary -

Global warming has come to a dead end and the continents are heating non-stop!

But you have a solution for the problem! Launching the ice of the pole to cool the continents!

Swing your bat and save the world! 

- Credits -

Made by @SamberoDev with help from @Irx99 in ~30h 

Music and SFX by @MothenseMusic
